verbs.description: [ARG0: Mika Brzezinski] [V: said] [ARG1: she and Joe Scarborough were told by Donald Trump why he would n't use Rudy Giuliani in his administration] .

Mika Brzezinski said [ARG2: she and Joe Scarborough] were [V: told] [ARG0: by Donald Trump] [ARG1: why he would n't use Rudy Giuliani in his administration] .
